tool_description: Analyzes competitor content performance, strategies, and gaps to inform content planning and competitive positioning.

competitor_urls.description: URLs of competitor content or websites to analyze

metrics_to_analyze.description: Metrics to focus on: engagement, seo_performance, content_depth, social_shares, readability

error_messages: Invalid URL format: Ensure all URLs are properly formatted and accessible
URL limit exceeded: Maximum 10 competitor URLs allowed
Empty competitor URLs: Provide at least one competitor URL to analyze
Invalid metrics selection: Use combinations from [engagement, seo_performance, content_depth, social_shares, readability]
Empty analysis focus: Specify what aspect to focus the analysis on
usage: Provide competitor_urls and analysis_focus, optionally specify metrics_to_analyze. Returns comprehensive competitive analysis with performance benchmarks.

competitor_names.description: Identified competitor names or site names

content_strategies.description: Identified content strategies for each competitor

performance_scores.description: Overall performance scores (0-100) for each competitor

strengths.description: Key strengths identified for each competitor

weaknesses.description: Identified weaknesses or gaps for each competitor

opportunity_areas.description: Areas where you can differentiate from competitors
